formattedAddress: Hospital For Special Surgery, 535 E 70th St, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: Hospital For Special Surgery, 535 E 70th St, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text:
Hello there. My name is Yoskaira Marte. I had a surgery 4/28/2023 of my right leg. Dr. Green was responsible as my anesthesiologist.

He was AMAZING! I suffer from enxiety. He was So SO SO SO SO SO patient! Wow!!! Amazing. He even made me feel better by telling me "Think of me as your guardian angel". I know bedside manner might not matter for some, but for someone whose this is their first surgery, bedside maners make a huge difference.
I will share my experience as much as possible so others can benefit from having such an amazing anesthesiologist on their side when they are the most vulnerable.
Thank you doctor!!!
